Test false data detection capabilities of monitoring systems

Potential for cascading failures in power flow

strategic_approach.defensive_testing_focus: Validate protection systems against: 1) False data injection 2) Load imbalance 3) Communication latency 4) Control system overloads
strategic_approach.overview: Systematic exploitation of identified vulnerabilities through coordinated attack vectors to test grid resilience while maintaining simulation control.
